The Role: Rakuten Kobo Inc. is looking for a Software Quality Assurance Engineer Co-op to join our Research and Development International team as a co-op for 8 months starting in September 2025. The team is comprised of many highly talented enthusiastic individuals who ensure the services and offerings from Kobo are available to both internal and external customers. Reporting to the Manager, Software Engineering, the Software Quality Assurance Engineer Co-op will work with the Research and Development International team made up of developers and testers and take an active part in delivering high quality software to Rakuten Kobo's users.?? The Person: • A passion for software development and delivery • Excellent oral and written communication skills Have a desire to work in a team but also be self-organising enough to be able to work on a task independently • The Skillset: Required: • Some previous experience in and Object-Oriented Software Language such as C# or Java • An understanding of T-SQL Databases • Experience with web technologies (HTML, JavaScript, CSS) • Some knowledge/experience with modern UI frameworks e.g. Angular, React • Knowledge of using source control systems such as Git, TFS, or Azure DevOPS. Knowledge of software testing • Techniques • Exploratory & Automation testing • White box and black box testing • Static - Manual or Automatic (using some tool e.g. - Veracode, SonarQube) • Understanding of Testing Pyramid • Testing framework - Selenium, Playwright, etc. • CI/CD Pipeline - Jenkins, Azure pipelines • Dynamic - Unit, Integration, etc. Tools - NUnit, Postman, Visual Studio, MSTest, etc. • The Perks: • Flexible hours and hybrid remote working environment • Subsidized in-office lunches • Four extended long weekends in the summer • Talent and development training budget • Free Kobo device + free weekly e-book or audiobook • Weekly Kobo Tech University sessions • Dog friendly office About Rakuten Kobo Inc.
